docs.abstract: At Sundance, the makers of "Sleepwalk With Me" and "Safety Not Guaranteed" talk about grounding magical-realist elements in astutely observed characters.
docs.snippet: At Sundance, the makers of "Sleepwalk With Me" and "Safety Not Guaranteed" talk about grounding magical-realist elements in astutely observed characters....

docs.lead_paragraph: PARK CITY, Utah -- There is a certain kind of movie you see over and over at Sundance, one that blends a bit of magical realism with astutely observed character humor - the leaps of logic that drove the family in "Little Miss Sunshine," for example.
docs.abstract: At Sundance, the makers of "Sleepwalk With Me" and "Safety Not Guaranteed" talk about grounding magical-realist elements in astutely observed characters.

docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft is opening a research lab in New York City, and the back story is a further sign of the brisk market for computing brains these days. Last month, Yahoo announced it was shedding 2,000 employees, about 14 percent of its work force, with cuts across the board, including its research staff. The new Microsoft lab, announced Wednesday night, is essentially a transplanted team from Yahoo.
docs.abstract: Bits blog notes Microsoft is opening a research lab in New York City, initially with 15 scientists formerly employed by Yahoo. (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: With the intention of grading the Bloomberg administration and the Department of Education on how well they are managing the city's public school system, City Councilwoman Eva S. Moskowitz issued her version of a learning plan yesterday, detailing what it would take to pass her tests with high marks. The guidelines, offered as an ''Individualized Education Plan for the New York City Department of Education,'' cite 14 areas, including school safety, instruction and operations, where Ms. Moskowitz, the chairwoman of the City Council's Education Committee, said improvements were needed.
docs.abstract: Councilwoman Eva S Moskowitz issues guidelines by which she says parents may assess New York City public schools in 14 areas, including safety, instruction and operations; says guidelines are needed because of what she describes as growing centralization of power in school system; photo (M)
docs.snippet: City Councilwoman Eva S. Moskowitz has issued a plan to grade the Bloomberg administration and the Department of Education on how well they manage the city's public schools....

headline.main: Councilwoman Unveils a Plan For Grading the School System

docs.lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co plans to offer a fully automated driverless vehicle for commercial ride-sharing in 2021, the automaker announced Tuesday, expanding its efforts in driverless cars and ride sharing - two areas where rivals have already made inroads.

docs.abstract: Google announced significant improvements to maps in 11 countries, using an in-house project called "Ground Truth." Google says it believes that geographic data is much more accurate if it comes from one source. What it means is that Microsoft, Amazon and Apple better be prepared to spend a fortune to even approach Google.

docs.lead_paragraph: After the track renovation break Tuesday at Fair Hill Training Center, I had three horses left to ride for Michael Pino. All three were "babies," or 2-year-olds, who were going to the starting gate for some schooling.
docs.abstract: How a horse learns to break from the starting gate.
